extension.name: S5 Tab Show
extension.author: Shape5.com
extension.description: This module will display up to 20 modules in various styles within sliding tabs, and is compatible with responsive sites.

field.name: spacer_instructions0
field.label: Note - Be sure to review all the instructions under the Position Selections And Button Options section after you have configured the basic options.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: custom_class
field.label: Custom Class
field.description: This will apply a custom class around the module itself without effecting the module style. This is used often in Shape5 templates.

field.name: mouse_effect_tabs
field.label: Activation Method - Tab Buttons
field.description: Select either mouse over or click to configure what method will trigger the slides.

field.name: mouse_effect_arrows
field.label: Activation Method - Arrows
field.description: Select either mouse over or click to configure what method will trigger the slides.

field.name: center_tabs
field.label: Center - Tab Buttons
field.description: Enabling this feature will center the tab buttons.

field.name: center_arrows
field.label: Center - Arrows
field.description: Enabling this feature will center the arrows. Not for overlay location.

field.name: hide_tabs
field.label: Hide Until Mouse Over - Tab Buttons
field.description: Enabling this feature will hide the tab buttons until the user hovers over the module.

field.name: hide_arrows
field.label: Hide Until Mouse Over - Arrows
field.description: Enabling this feature will hide the arrows until the user hovers over the module.

field.name: show_mobile_tabs
field.label: Show For Small Devices - Tab Buttons
field.description: Enabling this feature will override the hide feature above, and for the tab buttons to be shown on tablets and mobile devices.

field.name: show_mobile_arrows
field.label: Show For Small Devices - Arrows
field.description: Enabling this feature will override the hide feature above, and for the arrows to be shown on tablets and mobile devices.

field.name: duration
field.label: Duration
field.description: This is how long each slide will show for before transitioning to the next in the series.

field.name: pause_onhover
field.label: Pause On Hover
field.description: Enabling this feature will pause the entire tab show module if the user hovers over it. It will continue rotating once the member hovers away from the module.

field.name: padding
field.label: Extra Padding On Each Slide
field.description: Enabling this feature will add about 40px worth of padding between each slide. Disabling it will causes each slide to be against each the next, which is useful for displaying images.

field.name: spacer_instructions1
field.label: Each slide in the Tab Show module is a module position where you publish other modules to, ie: other modules become the slides of the Tab Show module. Once you have configured this module, publish your desired modules to the s5_tabX positions and they will become the slides of the Tab Show module. Select the positions below that you would like to show in this copy of the module. If you are using more than one copy of this module on a single page be sure to select different positions for each copy of the Tab Show module or else the modules will appear is both copies of the module.

field.name: spacer_instructions2
field.label: Note - The slides will not show unless the module is published to one of the s5_tabX positions, and you have selected the position below. Be sure that the modules published to the correct Menu Assignments as well.

field.name: spacer_instructions3
field.label: Note - Most Shape5 templates have these positions built in already, but you may need to add these to your template's templateDetails.xml file if they do not appear.

field.name: tab_show_positions
field.label: Tab Show Positions To Be Used

field.name: spacer_instructions4
field.label: Enter the button text (or an optional image) for each of the positions you selected above. The text is not required for the slides or buttons to show. Some Shape5 templates are designed to not use text or images.

field.name: tab_text_hover
field.label: Show Text Only On Mouse Over
field.description: Enabling this feature will hide the text until mouse over. The only time this should be used is if you are using images.

field.name: tab1_img
field.label: Option Image URL For Position s5_tab1

field.name: tab2_img
field.label: Option Image URL For Position s5_tab2

field.label: Option Image URL For Position s5_tab3

field.name: tab20_img
field.label: Option Image URL For Position s5_tab20

field.name: main_background
field.label: Custom Background?
field.description: Would you like to set your own custom background color or image for the entire module?

field.name: main_background_color
field.label: Choose A Background Color
field.description: Choose A Background Color with the color picker. This color will show on the background of the position. If you also choose to have an image background then that image will cover this color.

field.name: main_background_image
field.label: Background Image URL
field.description: Enter the url of the image you would like to use as a background image.

field.name: main_background_image_size_custom
field.label: Custom Background Image Size
field.description: If you chose custom above, enter your custom background size here.

field.name: main_slider_background
field.label: Custom Background?
field.description: Would you like to set your own custom background color or image for the entire module?

field.name: main_slider_background_color
field.label: Choose A Background Color
field.description: Choose A Background Color with the color picker. This color will show on the background of the position. If you also choose to have an image background then that image will cover this color.

field.name: main_slider_background_image
field.label: Background Image URL
field.description: Enter the url of the image you would like to use as a background image.

field.name: main_slider_background_image_size_custom
field.label: Custom Background Image Size
field.description: If you chose custom above, enter your custom background size here.
